game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the Lost Artifact from the Ancient Ruins
game.description: According to legend, a powerful artifact was hidden within the Ancient Ruins. Many have tried to find it, but none has returned. It is your mission to retrieve the artifact and return it to its rightful place. Be wary, though, for the ruins are said to be cursed.

task.description: Travel east from the village and follow the Stone Pillars. They will lead you to the entrance of the Ancient Ruins.

task.objective: Enter the Ancient Ruins and find the Lost Artifact
task.description: Make your way through the Ancient Ruins, avoiding traps and solving puzzles to reach the chamber where the Lost Artifact is kept.

task.objective: Return the Lost Artifact to Old Sage Amara
task.description: With the Lost Artifact in your possession, return to the village and present it to Old Sage Amara.
